text: Kulbhushan Sudhir Jadhav (also spelled Kulbhushan Yadav), also known as Hussain Mubarak Patel), (born 16 April 1970) is an Indian national. He was arrested in Balochistan, Pakistan, and charged with terrorism and spying for India's intelligence agencyâ€”Research and Analysis Wing. == References == Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Indian criminals Category:Indian activists Category:Marathi people
title: Kulbhushan Jadhav
